page.title: 16Education in Bromp on Swale
page.content: There are two schools in our village. Our{old school}is over one hundred years old and some of our parents went there when they were children.The building is still used for church meetings. We have had a{new school}built which is in one of our new estates.We have in our new school more facilities such as indoor toilets, a gym/hall, playing fields and gardens. School is from 9 am until 3.30 pm with an hour for lunch. At school as well as Maths and English we do some computing,art and craft,music and dancing,and topic work in History and Geography. We play{games}like netball, football and sometimes cricket. We have outings to the theatre and field trips sometimes for 4 days. When we leave school we go to Richmond Comprehensive School.
